org.pac4j.play.java
Class JavaController

java.lang.Object
  play.mvc.Results
      play.mvc.Controller
          org.pac4j.play.CallbackController
              org.pac4j.play.java.JavaController
All Implemented Interfaces:
play.mvc.Http.HeaderNames, play.mvc.Http.Status
public class JavaController
extends CallbackController

This controller is the Java controller to retrieve the user profile or the redirection url to start the authentication process.

Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Jerome Leleu

Constructor Detail

JavaController

Method Detail

getRedirectionUrl

protected static String getRedirectionUrl(String clientName)
This method returns the url of the provider where the user must be redirected for authentication.
The current requested url is saved into session to be restored after authentication.

Parameters:
clientName -
Returns:
the url of the provider where to redirect the user

getRedirectionUrl

protected static String getRedirectionUrl(String clientName,
                                          String targetUrl)
This method returns the url of the provider where the user must be redirected for authentication.
The input targetUrl (or the current requested url if null) is saved into session to be restored after authentication.

Parameters:
clientName -
targetUrl -
Returns:
the url of the provider where to redirect the user

getUserProfile

protected static org.pac4j.core.profile.CommonProfile getUserProfile()
This method returns the user profile if the user is authenticated or null otherwise.

Returns:
the user profile if the user is authenticated or null otherwise
